cooldown.title: Take it easy! 🖐
cooldown.description: You need to wait **{{cooldown}} seconds** before sending another message! 🤠

bot_tagged.title: Howdy! I'm {{username}}! 😁
bot_tagged.description:
I'm a Brazilian bot that plays music (with playlists!) while you play with your friends and let you listen to that podcast in the evening

To call me, just use the prefix **{{prefix}}** + the command you want! 🤓
Try **{{prefix}}help** 🤠

guildCreate.message:
Hi! I'm glad you added me to the **{{server_name}}** guild 🤗 
If you need any help, type on your guild {{prefix}}help 🤓

Want to know the latest Xurumin updates? **{{prefix}}news** 

Some commands you can try:
 - {{prefix}}filo
 - {{prefix}}monarktweet
 - {{prefix}}xvidros

**Need support?** https://discord.com/invite/bvb8YKSCQR
**For more commands:** https://xurumin.github.io/comandos

I hope we can have fun :)

nextLevel.message:
:clap: :heart_eyes: Congrats, {{user}}!
You leveled up **{{new_level}}** :partying_face:
:star2: As reward, you received **X${{prize}}**!

To check your level and money, use **{{prefix}}profile** on a guid.
:nerd: Keep using the bot commands to increase your level even more!

cmd_format.title: ❌ Error typing command:
cmd_format.description:
You need to put the **URL** of the image you want to put in the background. 
⚠️ **Warning:** It must be from **IMGUR.COM** and be in **PNG** or **JPG**
👉 Try **{{prefix}}setbg https://i.imgur.com/MbGPZQR.png**

Don't know how to get the link? Learn here http://bit.ly/3v6d8ay

invalid_url.title: ❌ Error typing command:
invalid_url.description:
You have typed an invalid URL. 
⚠️ **Warning:** Ela precisa ser do IMGUR.COM
👉 Try **{{prefix}}setbg https://i.imgur.com/MbGPZQR.png**

Don't know how to get the link? Learn here http://bit.ly/3v6d8ay

something_went_wrong.title: ❌ Oops!

Something went wrong.
Try again later :(

messages.title: 🔊 What is the song?

start.description:
❔ **How it works?**
Participating users must be in the same audio chat as the bot.
A random song will play for **15 seconds**.
Each round has **60 seconds**. The user who hits the song first wins.
Use x!gtm <song name> to try to get it right.

❗️ **Attention**
You can choose the genre of the songs and the number of rounds with x!gtm <genre *or* Spotify playlist> <number of rounds>
By default, the genre is random and matches last 10 rounds.
Genres available: `pop, rock, random`
Must have at least **3 rounds** and at most **15 rounds**.

To leave during the match, use `x!gtm -leave`
To skip the song, use `x!gtm -skip`

Click ✅ to **confirm** or ❌ to **cancel**.

messages.there_is_a_game: A game is about to start. If you want to start a new one, **cancel** the previous
messages.accuracy:
{{author}} -> You are {{accuracy}}% close to the answer.
You need at least 85% to get it right.

if you want to play again, use the command again :)

already_playing.title: ❌ Oops! It is already playing  "GUESS THE MUSIC" on the server

messages.title: 🏎 Racing

start.description:
❔ **How it works?**
The bot will start a race between 4 cars.
The first to arrive wins. Players who voted for the car, will have the table prize divided.
To participate, just use **{{prefix}}racing bet <color>**
The colors are: `blue, red, black, green`.

⚠️ **Important**
To participate, you will be charged an amount of **X${{price}}**.

❗️ **Attention!**
It will only be distributed **85%** of bets (15% is tax))
So, don't try to get all your friends to vote for the same car just to try to win more, see?

**If it does not start, the game will automatically run in 10 minutes.** 

Click ✅ to **start**.

messages.user_do_not_have_funds:
❌ You don't have enough money
Use **{{prefix}}profile** to see your balance.

dice.title: 🎲 Dice games

start.description:
❔ **How it works?**
 Xurumin will launch a magic dice, which only he has (it's trustable. :eyes:).
 If the dice falls on the side you choose, you win. If it doesn't fall, well ... You win the other way around.  (that is, you lose ...)

⚠️ **How to play**
To participate just use the command {{prefix}}dice <bet value> <dice side> 
(it's a 6-sided dice, okay?)
Example: `{{prefix}}dice 100 5`

❗️ **Attention!**
You can win between 1% and 50% of the bet value ...
Good luck hommie

loading.title: <a:loading:809177799969079326> Rolling the dice ...
loading.description:
Our dice-throwing kittens are... well...
doing their job...

confirmation.title: 🎲 Roll the dice - Confirmation
confirmation.description:
You will spend **X${{value}}** on the side **{{face}}**.
Are you sure?

click ✅ to **confirm** or ❌ to **cancel**

setup.description:

 Use the command `{{prefix}}gameoffers set` on the channel that you want to receive game offers.
To remove the channel, use `{{prefix}}gameoffers remove`.

You need to have the **administrator permission** to use the commands.
